description: Ivy learns that Jeremiah has left her everything -on condition she gives a home to his demanding sister Gladys, a professional hypochondriac who runs Ivy ragged. Fortunately thanks to Ivy's old costume as an angel in the village n...
name: The Legacy

review.name: Beware the angel calling.
review.reviewBody:
It's the reading of Jeremiah's will, and the interested parties are all gathered, including Ivy and Billy, they hear something to their advantage, but there's a proviso.

I feared that the laughs in the first episode had been somewhat of a fluke, I was wrong, this second episode if anything, was funnier than the first, it seems to be a show that makes the most out of misunderstandings, and one or two here were hilarious.

Hilda Braid is great as Gladys, it would have been great if she'd been a regular character, very funny, there is something great about an ageing malingerer.

Had me in stitches, 8/10.
